sentences.sContent: I have stationed another platoon on the island.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have stationed another platoon on the island.
sentences.sCn: 我已向那个岛派出了又一个排的守军。

sentences.sContent: That’s hardly an army. It’s not even a platoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: That’s hardly an army. It’s not even a platoon.
sentences.sCn: 这根本算不上一个军队，甚至连一个排都算不上。

trans.tranOther: a small group of soldiers which is part of a  company  and is led by a  lieutenant
